item.title: Vice President JD Vance to visit Indiana as Trump pressures GOP states to redistrict
item.description: As President Donald Trump pressures Republican states to reopen the process of redistricting mid cycle, Vice President JD Vance is set to meet with GOP leaders in Indiana.
